text: Nihsandeha juna manisaharule hamra ayataharuko barema chalakapatako niti apana'umchan uniharu hamibata lukeka chainan. Tasartha bhana ta ke tyo vyakti ramro cha juna agoma halinecha va tyo jo kayamatako dina niscinta bha'era a'unecha? Timi je cahanchau gardai ja'u, je jati timile garirakheka chau usale sabai dekhirakhekai cha
